description: This file defines a React functional component named 'FileList'. It displays a list of files with search and filter capabilities, fetching data via an API call and rendering individual file cards. It manages internal state for search query, status filter, loading state, error messages, and the list of items.

methods.name: load()
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the list of files using current search and filter parameters, updating component state accordingly.

methods.name: FileList({ onView, onPreview, onEdit, onDelete, refreshKey })

ctags.name: FileList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function FileList({ onView, onPreview, onEdit, onDelete, refreshKey }) {$/
